sani pradhana charitha mawana ragini em em es sinama pataye dewanne purwa pracharaka pataya pahugiya da antharjalayata mudahala wigasama wartha pita wartha thabanna samath wela thiyenawa.me purwa pracharaka pataya muda harala dinak gathawimatath maththen miliyanak dena me widiyowa narambaala thiyenawa.aththatama ragini em em es sinama pataye palamu chithrapatayada athishaya aakarshaniya sinama patayak wunath mehi nawathama sinama pataya methak prekshaka aakarshanayata pathwela thiyenne sani nisa bawatayi wadi dena pawasanne.me wasare marthu masaye patan lowa pura pradarshanaya aarambha kirimata mehi sanwidhakayin me wana witath siyalu katayuthu sampadanaya kara awasan.

indiyawe madhyawalata ha shasthraliya buddhimathunta lankawa gana thibenne apahadili saha ekthara durakata wikruthi awabodhayak bawa kalayak thisse ma wisin mathu karanu labu karunaki. 1980 gananwala sidu wu asarthaka indiya madihathwima samaye menma matha kalaya thula kalapaye bhu-deshapalanika balaya sandaha chinaya samanga indiyawata thibena tharagaya magin nirnaya wu lankawa pilibanda indiya wishleshanawala mulika awadhanaya yomuwanne aarakshawa sambandha karunuwalataya.
pahatha aakarayata diswewi.

shri lankawa, bangladeshaya ha simbabwe athara pawathi thunkon ekdina krikat tharagawaliye thewani tharagayedi aabadhayak hethuwen ema tharagawaliye anekuth tharagawalin menma shri lankawa ha bangladshaya athara pawathi test tharagawaliyen iwathwa siti kusal perera pasugiyada nam kala 15 denakugen yuth wissayi-20 sanchithaya sandaha nam kara thibini.

bankokhi sita wishesha guwan yanayakin meratata paminena thayi agramathyawaraya, ada paswaru 5ta katunayaka bandaranayaka jathyanthara guwan thotupole di piliganimen anathuruwa kolambaa bala peraharakin kandawagena yamata salasum kara athi bawayi wartha wanne. thayi agramathyawaraya wenuwen pawathwene nila piliganime uthsawaya kotuwa janadhipathi karyalaye di ada paswaru 6ta sanwidhanaya kota athi athara ehidi hamuda aachara pelapaliyak saha aachara wedi mura 19k pirinamimata niyamithayi.
